entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
